about_the_game:
The official soundtrack from Beholder, a dystopian adventure from Warm Lamp Games. Featuring original instrumental music composed and arranged by Principle Sound Design, this content contains all 6 tracks recorded for the game in MP3 format.

Audio design and music - Principle Sound Design
Michail Kotov
Anton Vasiliev
Sergei Cche
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from Beholder, a dystopian adventure from Warm Lamp Games. Featuring original instrumental music composed and arranged by Principle Sound Design, this content contains all 6 tracks recorded for the game in MP3 format.

Audio design and music - Principle Sound Design
Michail Kotov
Anton Vasiliev
Sergei Cche

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 МБ
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 Мб)
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space

name: Beholder - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
